content.detailedDescription:
In 1964, when i was 5 years old i was out side in the late afternoon with my mother and her friends. i looked up and saw a saucer shaped ufo hovering over a house across the street. it was so low it would have been on top of a two story house. i pointed at it and called to my mother to see it.
boys near by were pointing up and yelling at people to look at the ufo.
the craft had huge windows and i could see the people inside working and moving about. the men had black bushy hair and very white skin. they wore uniforms that were really tight and black. we now call something like that spandex. i remember i could clearly see the men inside from the waist up. 
the craft had a ring of light on it that were the primary colors, red, blue and yellow. it made no sound at all.
finally it moved over the houses and out of view. my mother took me inside the house and i looked out the windows trying to see it go away.
my father was in the navy at the time and i'm not sure where we were living, but many people around me saw the ufo, somebody must have reported it.

i have held on to this memory all this time and would like to know if
anybody else reported a sighting in 1964 in jacksonville, florida.

i saw a show about betty and barney hill, and the ship they showed looked exactly like the one i saw, windows and all.
content.summary: In 1964, when i was 5 years old i saw a saucer shaped ufo hovering over houses in jacksonville florida

content.detailedDescription: Cigar shape not of here of earth, speed unbelievable. i was out in the desert, i'm a prospector, hobby only.I am a retired law officer.I do  know aircraft, this was a ufo.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: For more info ,call.I know aircraft . this was not from here.It was cigar shape.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the show about the riverboats in viet nam.  i am connected to that story in that i was on another ship the uss saint paul(ca-73)that was in the same place at the same time and was hit.  the st. paul is almost as large as a battleship.  the report was we were hit by artillery fire.  this was no such animal.  i never told this story much before because its like bigfoot.  i was on the ship one year later when i saw two orange balls of light come out of the sky and hover over the coast of viet nam about 5 miles south of the dmz.  i watched them for four hours then f-4 phantoms chased them away.  i was told to keep quiet about the matter.  if you care to contact me my phone number is [phone number removed/cms/tg].
content.summary: My ship was hit in 68 and i saw 2 glowing objects in 69 i was on the st. paul ca-73

content.detailedDescription:
on wednesday april 15 ,2015 at the exact time of 2:08 pm i was on martin downs blvd stuart florida traveling in an easterly direction going to my insurance agents office.

i had just passed the intersection of high meadows and martin downs blvd when i looked north and first observed what i thought was a flock of 12 to 18 birds in the far northern distance. the movement of the formation was not what you would normally see birds do. there was something about the objects that made me stop my car and tell my wife "do you see what i'm seeing ? my wife's reply was yes i see it.  

i got out of my car and watched the northern sky at about a 90 degree angle. these white round objects were flying in some kind of formation but not making the usual turns like a flock of birds. the sky was a clear blue sky and no nearby clouds.

at one point the 12 to 18 objects completely disappeared and reappeared , making right turns and reappearing in another area of the sky. above the objects i could see a commercial plane that i would estimate to be 20,000 feet with the objects below.

the objects were traveling in a sw direction and then disappeared again. i tried to get another visual but was unable to do so, they were gone. 

this is my 3rd observation in the past 32 years .
content.summary: 12 to 18 ufo's  in formation.

content.detailedDescription: 8 pm i was going to my moms house 1 mile west of my residence in the field behind my moms i seen a huge white light hovering 100ft in the air my girlfriend and i went into my moms house to drop off a package dilivered to my house when we came back out it was gone it reappeared again hovering in a field across from my house i got out of the vehicle and it started to move slowly and silently towards me with a jet closley following it it was a huge translucent triangled craft when it went over my head at a low altitude i could see through the craft it had a huge white light in the front 2 red in back i had my girlfriend take a picture of it on her i phone the picture turnrd out great but we didnt get the jet chasing it in the picture i could hear the jet and see it clearly the craft made no noise and seemed to be flying sideways switching sides by 180 rotation then it disapeared in front of our eyes the jet was a misquito to the size of this craft it could disapear and reappear at will
content.summary: Translucent triangle bright white light on front and 2 red or orange on back huge silent craft

content.detailedDescription: I was living in a trailer .At a foot-ball training ground at a town called grey's .Which is in essex . it was about 5.Oo p.M. and i was talking to my brother and friend .Out side in the carpark. something caught my eye.I looked up and see a very bright shinning light .Headed toward me .At tree top hight .With in second's .It was at five foot high of the ground. and moving really fast .And glowing. it dropped low and shot of toward the thame's . toward the r.S.P.B. nature reserve.  i observed the same thing the same time the following evening.   when i first see it i thought it was a police helicopter.   when i see it iwas shocked. my brother and friend never see it .For some strange reason.  i was a little shocked but not worried about it. as this was not my first u.F.O. encounter.  i lost sight of it as it dropped lower.And shot across the a13 road .And across the marsh. and over a sea wall.   i have seen footage of it on a you tube video . but they looked difrant  .To when i see them.  the other encounter's have all ocured within the south east of essex  .England .
content.summary: Bright, very fast moving light.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello mufon,

i was coming home from dinner at around 
820 pm yesterday april 14th 2015 when i saw a bright red light in the sky thinking nothing of it. as i walked towards my door 
the light became brighter and dropped down very close to the horizon very quickly and changed from a light aqua blue to white to red all while standing still and then darting from left to right. i called my mom to come see and she told me to pull out my camera since it was still twilight i was able to capture our sigthing. the ufo continued to descend into an area of houses and floated around and seemed to have gone lower into the trees where we couldn't see it anymore so i stopped taping and we went inside. after that i took my dogs for a walk behind my condo where i usually take them which is the elementary school playing field. i was afraid to walk further south since that's where i saw the ufo. but i continued my walk and observed the sky and started seeing one ufo very far into the sky leaving a trail then more appeared about 4 or 5. one coming very low close enough for me to be able to tell it definitely was not an airplane. it was your typical saucer shaped disc with lights all around the sides flashing in pattern with some lights shining brighter than others.
i was afraid because the more i looked the more seemed to fill the sky so i began to walk back home i was very very afraid at this point. i did want to video tape what i was seeing but my phone camera isn't good for night shots and of course i was too terrified to even think. as i hurried home i kept looking back to see if they were coming closer but as i watched they started fading and disappearing higher into the sky and i got home pretty shaken up.
i'm very confused and i'd like to know what i saw. i have encountered many ships before but never this close and never on camera. and also the phone i used to capture the video is a samsung s5. thank you very much.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I caught one on camera and then went to walk my dogs around the area and saw more closer.

content.detailedDescription:
Summer 1997 - evening about 22 pm . i was watching a movie in a summer theater under the night sky .The pallas movie theater was on top of the tallest building in the area, with clear view of the sky over the wall surrounding the top of the building . screen oriented towards n - nw . was after half of the movie's duration . four lights appeared in the starry sky in two rows and steady formation - distance from each other.  bright orange yellow moving from west to north east in the horizon and appearing to be in quite some distance . everyone in the theater noticed the strange light formation.  the speed was too fast for a commercial airplane or even military - that never fly over our island -and corfou town anyway - and the long distance made them visible for a few seconds . it appeared obviously, as a very strange phenomenon to everyone, as most of the audience in the theater, were pointing out towards the lights.
suddenly and while they were  over -and towards the end- of the large theater screen, - and with out reducing speed, or apparently turning, or changing direction- the lights change to very bright white and then blue and shoot upwards at very sharp angle. everyone observed them till they were lost in the distance, in an unbelievable speed. from the second the color and direction of the lights was changed and till they were lost, lasted no more than three or four seconds but the change of color brightness course and level ( the angle of about 30 degrees they shot in the sky  ) - nothing we know could have been . no sounds were heard , no motors, but the speed and bluish flame - like lights, left an idea of a trace but this could be our perception of speed and light . i can't , to this day, think of nothing changing direction and from traveling horizontal -with out turning or reducing speed - shoot itself upwards,  like those lights we witnessed . if there were not another two hundred people or more, that witnessed  the same phenomenon, i would question my sighting but we all saw the same thing . 
i am not a "believer" of any kind and have never bothered to report this,  till a friend reminded me of the incident a few days ago.. i still can't think of anything capable of changing direction and course this way .Planes , or even rockets and missiles ( hardly flying over our town) , just  respond according to flight's rules and certainly do not fly like this ! 
 from the noise that went on among the audience,  the cabin personnel attending the projecting cameras, stopped the movie and turned the lights on . in the few moments it took for people to calm down after this sighting, i had the chance to discuss it with a few people i know, ( small town) and realized they saw exactly the same thing 
 discussing incident with more of the audience after the end of the movie, i understand that  everyone apparently was stunned at this uncommon change of direction and the tremendous speed the bluish lights were lost in the sky .  i was told they all observed the same exactly phenomenon and no one heard sounds .
content.summary: Lights changing color and course

content.detailedDescription:
Background: my recollection of this story is terrible and i wish i would have known more about what to pay attention to at the time. 9/11 sparked my interest in the military and i later joined the army as an ammunition specialist (89b) with the 395th ordnance company whose home location is here in appleton, wisconsin. to date, i have served 7 years as a drilling reservist and my effective date entering the irr (inactive ready reserve) will be april 24th. during my time in the army, i served two tours in afghanistan - once for the entire year of 2009, and another in summer 2011-summer 2012.

event description: i was at home on the night of september 11th, 2001 in the city of <removed location details to protect witness or preserve evidence>  i was a 7th grader at st. joseph middle school (has since been renamed by the aces/xavier educational system) when 9/11 happened. that night, i remember going home and watching the news with my parents and only brother and at some point that night (i wish i could pinpoint the time), we began to hear what sounded like explosions coming from outside. naturally, we stepped out to have a look. **it is very important to note that all air-traffic was halted and/or cancelled on 9/11**. when we looked straight up into the sky, we saw bright white flashes of light (sort of like an exploding star) followed by a bang coming from each one. their altitude was indiscernible so i would have to estimate 35,000ft which is roughly the cruising altitude of a boeing 747. in reality, it could possibly have been much further above us.

my current interpretation of my mother's best explanation at the time is the one which stands out to me the most. she suspected that it was coming from f-16 fighter jets or possibly another indiscernible military aircraft breaking the sound barrier right above us. being that i was young and really didn't know any better, i had dismissed it as that for the rest of  my life up until now. to me, after serving in the military and after having been around such military aircraft and experienced their effects up-close and personal, there is no possible way that the flashes could have been the result of afterburners or sonic boom. a better description of these "flash-booms" would be more consistent with exploding shells fired from a flak cannon.

current speculation: there is only one possibility that i can mention based on what i know which would accurately describe the events of that night. the fact is, my knowledge is quite limited and my recollection is even worse. perhaps they were objects with a single-burst propulsion system designed to make the "final leap" out of the atmosphere and into space.

questions:
1.Why<removed location details to protect witness or preserve evidence> ? i really don't know of any significant reason why the us military or even any extra-terrestrial presence would have any interest in this area - even remotely. fort mccoy is around 3 hours away from here and they really ko don't have much in the way of fighter jets. (that i know of.)
2. is my speculation even realistic?
3. fighter jets. ...Really?!
4. are there similar encounters or observations within the ufo-experienced community?
content.summary: Explosions in the sky. definitely not f-16's

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard looking through my binoculars at the heavens. as i was viewing through the binoculars i noticed a triangular craft coming into view it has three lights i need corner of the craft 2 lights were yellowish and one light was red. the craft was black in color. the craft moved fairly slowly. by the time i noticed it it was moving to the south east on a straight line trajectory. it disappeared over the rooftops and that was the last i saw it.
content.summary: Black triangular craft

content.detailedDescription:
Glowing lights horizontally appeared... northwest horizon... viewed at m21 and corner store parking lot... the glowing lights vanished ... mins went by ..2 appeared exactly the same ...A few mins went by ...Then vanished .. a few mins went by ...3 appeared exactly the same lasted a few minutes then vanished.... over 7+ helicopters and drones and a stealth approached the horizon area where objects were hovering ... they separated heading east south ... circled about half way then were gone .... 
got out of vehicle after the lights had disappeared... saw all of our aircraft approaching the area ...One helicopter was silent no noise ..The other was loud ... there was an aircraft that had 3 lights shaped as a v wide wing span ... came from west to east over top of us and kept going east ... 
i was shaking ..Thrilled...Scared ...Astonished ...Shocked ... in awe... i'm very happy i was able to experience this in my lifetime ...I'm 43yrs old ..My friend that was with me is 32yrs old ..
content.summary: 1 appeared with glowing type lights horizontal formation ..Approx a few minutes i've had...A few mins later 2 appeared matching exact ...Hovered for a few minutes...Vanished...A few mins later 3 matching appeared exact ...Lasted a few mins.. gone

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Me my boyfriend my son and my friend and her son were walking from my moms house to my friends house it was dark and we always look at the stars with my son...My boyfriend said look that star is moving and i said look to my friend and as soon as she looked the 2nd light appeared and we started freaking out and then the 3rd and 4th light appeared they flew right over us coming towards us from the west and went passed us to the west.. they stayed exactly the same space apart and the same speed it was not very fast but wasnt slow either...I was totally freaked out and my son seemed excited and my friends son as well.
my boyfriend said he thought it was a star but then it started to move...I never really saw anything come that close ... i have seen moving stars but always thought they were satelites ...They kept fading in and out and it was freaking me out. i told them lets get out of here now but they were still staring.  we tried to record but all you can hear is me freaking out you cant see the lights .You can see one at the last 3 seconds of video its on my friends iphone
content.summary: 4 lights flying quitely single file we noticed the second 1 first then the first one and finally realized there was four following eachother.

content.detailedDescription:
While sleeping on my sofa, i had this experience: i was laid back in a chair, much like at a dentist office, when two very tall human-like beings, approx. seven foot tall, came through a doorway standing side-by-side. they were dressed from head-to-toe with blue surgical clothing, but i could see their eyes, which were very large and blue. the one on the right was holding in his right hand a silver chain. hanging from it was a round silver ball with a pointed bottom around 5 inches wide. when i noticed it, the being started to hide it behind him. in my mind i was thinking it was the novacaine shot because the being went to hide it from me, like the dentist hides the shot from the patient, yet i knew it wasn't the novacaine shot. they were just making me think that in my mind. i begin to speak to them and realized that i was drunk-like. my words were slurred. i explaining to them that i was not afraid of the dentist and they didn't need to hide this object from me. next thing i know one of them leaned in towards my face and that's when i went unconscious. i woke up during the middle of a procedure and my mouth was wide open. they were doing something but they saw i was conscious and leaned in again and i went out. this is the end of the encounter.

the next day, i remembered my experience, which at first i thought was a dream. i began to look for evidence and saw that my mouth was split in the right corner. this made me start to think it was not a dream. also, my tongue was not numb, but less sensitive to heat, as i had to reheat my coffee an extra 15 to 20 seconds in order to feel it to the usual temperature. i also had a strange taste in my mouth. i wouldn't say it was metallic, but it was strange. additionally over the next few days, i completely lost my sense of smell. that's when i discovered a large lump inside my nose that wasn't there before. it was inside the septum part on my right nostril.

one other thing that disturbs me is, i used to have a beautiful gold crown on a back molar. i have not had any work done on it, but have discovered just recently, that the crown has been replaced by a gold cap. this disturbs me the most.

i have had numerous strange experiences sort of like this, but had no proof.

here is one from childhood:

i was 6-7 years old in denver colorado which is my home. i did not see anything or remember anything but i will explain briefly what happened. i was at a playground with my older brother, leonard, who was always good at watching me and very responsible. i was facing west while swinging, as he faced east playing marbles on the ground below and behind me. suddenly he jumped up and screamed, "run, there's a flying saucer." before i could even react, he ran away as fast as he could, leaving me by myself. i looked in the sky to the west and saw an advertising airplane with the lights on flying about in the distance and it was certainly no threat. i knew that my brother would know better and that he surely would not have thought that plane was a flying saucer. i turned to go home, it was dusk. the next thing i remember is, it was very dark and i was walking up to the porch of my house and my oldest brother david alarmingly said, "where were you? we were just getting ready to go look for you." i asked where my brother leonard was and david said, "he's in bed, he's sleeping." i then realized that some amount of time had passed, but i didn't, or couldn't say anything. i thought david wouldn't believe me.

i was 6-7 years old, leonard was almost 2 years older, and david was 8-9 years older than me. the playground was at most, two blocks away from my home. these were short city blocks.
content.summary: Abduction during sleep in dentist office setting.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been reviewing images from nasa archives for years, looking for anomalies.  last night i found some links to the rolls of film neil armstrong and buzz aldrin shot when they first achieved lunar insertion in december 1969.  they took a massive amount of images on both the light and the dark side of the moon.

i examined image #5448 and found these objects around 8pm, 13 april 2015.  their sharpness made them stand out from the surface.

i used an archive at: 
  
the apollo flight journal
    journal home page
        apollo 11
            photography index

there are (9) nine hasselblad 70-mm film magazines available via the apollo 11 journal home page.

70-mm magazine r - as11-37-5433 to 5555 is the second one.

image number 5448 is at: 

image number: 5448 - resolution is 3900 x 3900.  since it is so large i included, instead, a expanded jpg i made from the original.  i think maybe you would like to see the original, just to verify your not having a hallucination.  the largest magnification is 300% using a browser magnifier to expand the original 3900 pixel image.

that looks like a habitat and spaceship.
the last image is the habitat and spaceship with the colors reversed using paint.Exe.

included are (3) three attachments:
1.) moon - apollo 11_70-mm magazine r - as11-37-5433 to 5555_#5448_exploded_jpg.Txt
2.) moon - apollo 11_70-mm magazine r - as11-37-5433 to 5555_#5448_exploded (2).Jpg
3.) moon - apollo 11_70-mm magazine r - as11-37-5433 to 5555_#5448_exploded-color reversal.Jpg
content.summary: Landed habitat and spaceship on the moon

content.detailedDescription: Wife was out on the deck for a smoke, called me to witness the lights. moving slowly south to north east and slowly descending and ascending as it moved along. very big in size (maybe the size of a double garage) very intense bright white lights, 4 across, seemed to shoot out like a small search light occasionally. lights would then change to a brilliant red color that were in a triangle shape pointing upwards (maybe 5 or 6 red lights) when this happened the white lights went out or were not visible. quite friday night at 11 pm, no noise from object. didn't know what it was but my reaction was to go get the camera, of course camera didn't work, we had recently downloaded some personal pics and accidentally put the card in protect mode. grabbed the i pad and managed 1 pic but by that time it was almost out of site and i couldn't zoom in with the new ipad. object moved out of sight behind buildings and trees. seemed to be over a ring road around the outskirts of the city. wondering if this was witnessed by anyone else.
content.summary: Spotted from deck, watched for aprox 3 min

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading due west to go to work in three rivers when i noticed that familiar orange/yellow glow at treetop level. and as i was driving i was saying to myself that this could be another sighting (and boy it was). i stopped my car directly with the craft in my vision above a house due north of me. i shut off my car and got out and rested my arms on the car roof and watched and listened. there was a constant orange/yellow light to the craft, and also the lights went in a counter clock rotation around the craft making a swooshing sound as it rotated. i could see beings in the windows on the top part of the craft i would say greys, but surprising and hard for me to fathom i seen 3 humans in the craft that were in military uniforms. so i get in my car because i want a closer look (i was going to drive up the driveway at the house) so i turn around head due east for 50 ft turn left (north) as i'm about to turn into the drive the craft rose a few feet and before my eyes it was a star. that's how fast those things can go. i've always wanted to relive this sighting (hypnosis maybe) due to the humans in military uniforms.

i can sketch out my 1st and this sightingif needed.
content.summary: Saucer shape orange/yellow lighted craft 5 feet above house hovering. with occupants.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cold snowy and blowing night, i needed to go out to the wood pile and get wood for the night to put in my woodstove. i remember it was  a sat. because saturday night live was almost over. i put on my cold weather gear and grabbed the log sling and headed out back. i had the sling loaded and was about to pick it up and i noticed a beam/shaft of light that had followed the roof of my mobile home and was right by me. after my previous experience i chased the light shaft to the next door mobile home. i being curious took my mitten off and put my bare hand into the light shaft(very warm). i ran into the house tried to convince my wife to witness it.
 but alas she was too scared when she seen it out the window, i grabbed our camera and took photos of the light shaft.(none of them turned out due to flash and blizzard )i should have covered the flash. so this beam of light was scanning the mobile homes from one to the next. i followed it into the woods hoping that it would land, i continued on until the beam withdrew back into the clouds.
content.summary: Shaft of light from cloud to ground during blizzard conditions.

content.detailedDescription: On the beach playing volleyball, between games checked the time 5:56, laid down on the sand, looked up, saw the object coming into view from above my head, as i watched it i could see it was very high , it looked like when you see an airplane at cruising altitude like 30,000-40,000 feet, but this was going much faster, for example the space station takes about 5 minuets to travel across the sky this did it in about 12 seconds. it just stayed straight.  the sighting took about 6 seconds by the fifth second  i realized this was extraordinary, at the same time i knew it was leaving the field of view, when i said can you guys see this it was too late...It was too fast and to far away, also space x launched a rocket today but i cant find out the flight path or time (that's kind of why i wanted to report this cause maybe its something simple like that) thanks so much ive wanted to see something and finally did, my wife saw a basket ball sized orb on a night time horse ride 34 years ago now i have a story.
content.summary: High altitude very fast moving

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home one night from a quick shopping trip and saw a bright spotlight in the sky. i'm used to seeing lights because we live close to atlanta and see planes all the time, but this one seemed low and going the wrong direction. all of a sudden,i see it quickly fall  and my first thought was that this plane must be going down. i notice a blue light on the left side and a red light on the right side of the "headlight". the main light gets much dimmer as i get closer probably because of my vantage point. i slowed down in case it is going to crash, but then it stopped and seemed to hover over the tree line. at this point i'm about half a mile from it. i had cars behind me so i slowed a bit as i drove under it. it was hovering close to the road near a home. as i glanced straight  up, i saw a shape. the best way to describe it was two helicopters touching noses and the tails separated in the shape of a v. it was not how i have ever seen them described before so it threw me. they were more lights on the edges of the object and all were red and blue. there were no lights on the bottom or protrusions on the bottom. the point of the object was no longer pointing towards the direction i had just come from but about 90* away from the road (it was pointing at 12:00 and now 3:00) as i got about 1/2 mile down the road, i decided to turn around and get another look because i just didn't believe my eyes. as i turned around i didn't see it anymore and thought maybe the trees were covering my view. i rolled my windows down and turn my radio off. i couldn't hear or see anything, it was like it had vanished.
content.summary: Delta object hovering with main white light and blue and red lights on side

content.detailedDescription:
It was summer around 23:30 and a friend and i were walking due west on a dirt road. (lane to resort) it was 1972 or 73, when we noticed to the north a strange sight. it was a orange/yellowish color of lighted craft moving due east at treetops level. what made us take notice was the shape and the motion of the craft. it was a slanted rectangle shape(parallelogram), we heard no sound and we were stuned by what we were witnessing. we watched til it was out of sight to our east
 the next thing that verified our sighting was a guy on a motorcycle that my friend knew (older) he was driving home from work 3-11 shift. he stopped and was really excited and asked us if we seen the thing in the sky, we told him we had. he said he had noticed it heading south and timed it so he could be closest to it when it went across the road he was driving on. he said he stopped his motorcycle in the area were it would cross above him.
 when it crossed over him it stopped his engine and all he could hear was a low hum with this thing tumbling head over heel above him.  when it was out of his sight he started up his motorcycle and headed south towards us. he was very happy and excited that we witnessed what he had, as were we.

 this was my 1st sighting. the next 2 get better.
content.summary: Tumbling orange/yellow parallelogram craft at treetops heading due east.

content.detailedDescription: Very large glowing white saucer shaped object moving very fast with cloud like camo cover and trail.It was following other jet trail.
content.summary: Very large saucer moving very fast glowing white with cloud camo emission

content.detailedDescription: On april 14, 2015 around 8 p.M. est my girl friend was returning from work. she noticed a low flying triangular shaped craft with red lights moving slowly in a straight path following hartford road, near lenape high school/ johnson's farm in medford new jersey. she returned home, and after about 15-20 minutes we left to go get food. i noticed it in a clearing in front of a residential neighborhood, and thats when she mentioned to me she had seen it on her way home. it was also lightly raining, and that was probably the primary reason i did not stop and take a picture (although now this is my biggest regret, and i am quite furious with myself. i had nothing else to do tonight, and should have followed it for as long as i could.) we went to eat, and since the aircraft had only moved a mile or two from lenape high school to medford in the 30 minute period between her getting home and changing before we went out to eat, i figured i could track it down after we ate. unfortunately, i drove around for 45 minutes and couldnt find it again. i dont know why i didnt stop at first, and i am extremely upset with myself now. it was not a plane. it was not a helicopter. i dont know what it was, but i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Low hovering triangular shape craft with red lights are each corner. straight line path moving very slowly/hovering

content.detailedDescription: Object was hovering. took photos. looked alternately like an orb, a tube, two headlights. horse shoe shaped. pulsating. solid. white and blue alternating. segments of white and blue. dark and light parts.
content.summary: Orb like object that extended to a wormlike shape

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting a friend or friends and we had been playing xbox when we took a break to go outside to smoke cigs. i'm a star gazer always looking into the sky to catch a meteor or satellite or locate planets. about the only thing i know about planets is that there more orange colored than stars. i noticed two red lights horizontal to ach other and began to ask my two friends what they thought they was. before i could get it out a huge white light came on in the shape of a rectangle. i was in shock it felt. it stayed on for what seemed to be several minutes and a red light appeared inside the white light. it also seemed as something was moving inside the light. the light eventually went out and it was then just red lights, it moved slowly off to the left of our position going behind a southward mountain. i wanted to see were it went so we three began running south to get another view of it. this is when the adrenaline and heart rate was really going and i'm not sure what i saw but sarah was the first to see it again and point it out. when i caught sight of again it moved directly over top of us and existed of several, maybe nine dimly lit red lights with two on the very end of it blinking back and forth. it seemed very low in altitude and made absolutely no sound whatsoever. to answer what do i think it was? i honestly don't know but it seemed intelligent. my feelings of this experience is mixed in confusion, wonder, was it spiritual? never a day goes by that i don't think about it. id like more than anything to have an answer for it, whatever it was. the actual outside the object could not be determined due to the blackness of the sky. even when it went directly overhead no shape could be seen.
content.summary: Was star gazeing..Saw two red looking stars..Told two friends..Huge white rectangular light came on...Followed by a red light left of center inside white light..

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Myself and family arrived home from town, my wife noticed the light first, then we all saw it. it was moving very slowly coming toward us from diectly in front of us from the northwest. my children were even aware that this was something strange.
it continued coming from the north west for about a minute, then turned to the north, very slowly. continued in that direction for about 45 seconds, then turned to the northeast for the remainder of the sighting. we watched it the entire time. it simply kept travelling ne to a nne direction until it dissapeared/faded.
this is not the first time i have seen this type of object. i have been seeing them since i was a child. i have been close enough to touch one on one occasion.
i reported last month to the nuforc site about a sighting - also witnessed by my wife and myself, here is is the report: 

occurred : 3/11/2015 21:30 (entered as : 03/11/2015 21:30)
reported: 3/11/2015 6:16:35 pm 18:16
posted: 3/13/2015
location: pictou landing (canada), ns
shape: circle
duration:40 seconds
orange/red ball of light, arrived into field of view from southeast faster than a military jet, slowed, zig-zagged, turned to the north

out having a smoke approx. 9:30 pm. looking northeast at the stars. noticed a very fast moving orange/reddish object come from the southeast - moving in a north-westerly direction.

the object slowed to a speed comparable to a commercial jetliner passing overhead, then zig-zagged up an down very slowly for about 10 seconds/5 times.

the object then accelerated extremely quickly and turned to a northerly course until out of sight - about 4 seconds from acceleration until disappearance.

i have witnessed this type of sighting many times in the past few years - one was particularly unnerving as i was close enough that i could have touched the object if i had tried to. always seen with witnesses. reporting now because i'm seeing objects with increasing frequency.
                           end of report


i have witnessed these things many times - with 5 different witnesses. i'm seeing them more often in the last 2 years, however, and i am beginning to be very curious about what they are and why i'm seeing them more often. i wrote that i have always seen them with witnessess, but when i was young i saw them alone. i have witnessed them in 5 different locations in nova scotia, hundreds of kilometers away from one another - and once when i was in alberta.
content.summary: Extremely bright red/orange sphere, noticed when getting out of our truck returning home from town

content.detailedDescription: On the early evening of august 24/2014 at around 8 p.M., i witnessed a sphere that originally looked so bright that i thought it was a fireball. i filmed this craft/sphere with my ipad2, for a brief period facing my backyard approaching from behind the house and then over the house. the sphere originally was very bright, almost like it was on fire.I managed to film it for one minute at first and when it was about to go out of my sight, i shut off the camera (as the storage was minimal on the camera). the sphere initially appeared over our backyard and seemed to stop for a moment and than continue right above my girlfriend and i. after i stopped filming initially, the crafts bright light seem to go dull and i could now see a black sphere and what appeared to be a search light. at this point i turned the camera back on and captured the change in the sighting of the sphere as it was approaching above the house and about to leave our sight. before it actually left our sight, the sphere reversed as if it knew i was filming it and made a very loud pop or bang and than it actually shot or fired to the right as if it was a jet boost. it is hard to see it on the video doing this at the beginning of the black sphere part 2 video, but if you look close and listen you will hear the craft make a loud bang and than burst or shoot to the right almost like a nitrous oxide burst. also at this point the black sphere/craft looked like it had a search light as it was moving left to right, which was much different than the video i shot just seconds before. the quality on the first video is great but it is a bit hard to see on the part 2 video (at the beginning at least) but if you watch in hd and look closely you can really see it above the house. i than proceeded to chase it around the house and filmed it as it passed over my town, as far as i could film it. this is my third bizarre sighting, i will site the other video related sighting which was filmed in the same place on august 6 2014 at night case number 64143 (ryan miles mufon investigator). these sightings can be viewed in best quality on youtube under the name codsterl, however i attached two fair quality videos to this report.
content.summary: Witnessed what looked like a fireball outside window, and than i proceeded to film it.

content.detailedDescription: I'm stood on my drive smoking a cigaret and it looked up to the stars that were clearly visible i noticed a triangle shaped object with la light in the centre changing colour it made the hairs on my neck stand up. there was all so orange orbs ( see these a lot) i've seen all sorts of aircraft and ithis resembles nothing i've seen before. it was moving north to south and i viewed it for a whole minute . it just passed over and disappeared behind the trees . most nights i can see something in the sky but not this close up. no photo as i did not have my phone.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft with central light surrounded by orbs

content.detailedDescription:
I've put an approximate time and date for this event as i don't recall exactly when it happened, it happened a few years ago, that's all the information i can give honestly without lying. 

i live in swansea on the south coast of wales, my house is on a hill (this can't be regarded as personal information as swansea is very hilly). i remember for no particular reason just moving my desk chair to my window (south facing) just to admire the view of swansea bay. as i'm looking at the water, i notice what looks to be a green firework over the mumbles (an area of swansea, seen in my pictures). these objects, about 6 or 7 from what i can remember were falling in formation, in a manner of which a firework would, going upwards and outwards from a central point until gently falling downwards, until they all stopped dead midair. at this point, one turned red, and moved up and to the right from where it was, and then the other objects formed up in a perfect line behind it, they were perfectly spaced between themselves. once they were all lined up, they all moved slowly as one in the same plane.

 at this point i was fairly freaked out by the situation and moved away from my window, so unfortunately i can't shed any light on what they did next.
 
upon consideration i can only imagine that these objects were in fact over the bristol channel. as i said, my first thought was a distant fire work, so their size from where i was sort of between the star and aspirin option on this page. they left no trail, and the obvious direction changes, hovering and formation flying, plus the fact that one of the objects changed colour makes it apparent this was not in fact a firework. 

for the sake of helping you visualize what i saw, i went in to google maps street view and screen-shotted swansea bay from a similar angle from where i was witnessing this and roughly added the flight paths of these objects. don't take this as their exact flight path, i'm only illustrating the main changes in their movement and shape.

picture 1:

showing the firework type formation and their apparent motion. they're not moving very quickly.

picture 2:

they stop midair, one turns red.

picture 3: 

i've shown where the red object finished off, but they were all moving simultaneously. 

picture 4:

they sat in this formation for a few seconds, and then started moving up wards in the direction indicated. again, not very quickly, contrary to many other ufo accounts.


even as i write this i'm getting a strange feeling of anxiety, i've not heard of anyone else describing what i saw. but the event didn't take place for long, and i just so happened to be looking in that direction. one thing to consider about this is that an earthquake, incredibly rare to this part of the world struck a couple of years later. it might be a coincidence, but i'm aware geological activity and ufo sightings go hand in hand a lot.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Formation flying.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out by my back door in the yard having a smoke. it was a clear blue sky and i happened to look  up over the sky line. i saw these two objects that appeared to be shaped like peanuts in a shel. they were reflecting in the sunlight. at first i assumed they were aircraft. we did live under an approach to yul. but as i continued looking at the objects i realized that there is no way these can be planes as they are moving way to slowly and they were much too close to each other to be safe for planes.
i decided to run inside to get out my nikon digital cam. 
when i returned, the objects were still approximately in the same area. i pointed my camera and started to take photos. the photo i am sharing is one that i used the digital zoom at its maximum.
with the zoom maxed out, it was hard to keep the object in the view finder, but i managed to get at least two images before they floated out of my view.

eventually both objects moved out of my sight behind some trees and i lost sight of them. 

the other shots do not seem to show much of anything, just some white spots on a blue sky background.
content.summary: Two white objects moving slowly across the sky just before sun set

content.detailedDescription:
Walking back from the local shop -approximately 100m from my house. clear evening. looking almost directly north at the brightest star in the sky which was about 40 degrees above the horizon. 

noted one single moving white light which i imagined was a routine satellite sighting. stopped to watch the transition. light started at the 7 o'clock position of the brightest star on a bearing of roughly 300 degrees magnetic from me and tracked directly towards me. as i watched the singular white light - i noticed that there appeared to be more mass to the object as parts of it - beyond the central white light - appeared to reflect light. i assumed that perhaps this was light reflecting from the structure of the satellite - the solar panels for example - but soon realised that the distance of the additional lights from the central light would make the scale all wrong for it to be a satellite.  

the light characteristics were not redolent of the myriad satellites i've witnessed over the years. this object was behaving like a satellite insofar as it tracked fast and silently across the sky - but the outer lights made it very different from anything i've seen before. from first sight about 25 - 30 degrees above the horizon until the object was almost directly above my head was about 45 seconds or so.. as the object drew to an overhead position the outer two lights which were in a direct line with the central brighter light, became more prominent. the three lights looked as though they were travelling in perfect formation.  it was impossible for me to tell the size of the lights or their distance from one another and thus the range from me was impossible to calculate. in respect to trying to describe how this formation looked - i would say that - if the central white light was on the fuselage of a 747 and the outer lights at the wingtips of the 747 - then i would estimate that the 747 would have been flying at around 3,000 - 5,000 ft.

the evening was clear and totally silent and the object / lights made no sound whatsoever. as the lights passed over my head they moved away from me on a bearing of approximately 119 degrees magnetic - to the south east. roughly 20 seconds after passing overhead, the outer lights faded and the inner light followed by fading away some 15 - 20 seconds later. 

i am an ex armed forces senior officer - with a background in aviation.  this sighting struck me as particularly odd and not in concert with anything i recognise.
content.summary: Three white lights. bright light in the centre - two outer lights dimmer; in a perfect line. moving in straight line. silent
